answer:
ImmunizeBC does not provide specific travel health vaccine recommendations. There is general travel vaccine information here. Please contact a travel health clinic.

question: I will go to South Africa, Zambia and Botswana in 15 days. What kind of vaccine is needed?Need to make an appointment and do a medical examination in advance? How long does it take
